author: jmarino
msg: add async groovy invoker; not yet operational

author: jkuhnert
msg: Refactored XTile to use encodeURI() to encode url parameters.
Refactored Timeout to be a little friendlier wrt context and checking for function existance.
Refactored tapestry.form to handle old style invalid_field functions to help Palette function correctly.
Added new ValidatableFieldExtension interface that is used by Palette to support optionally overriding a
particular type of client side contributed validation when components need them. Also added new tapestry.form.validation
function that validtes Palette fields specifically. (ie options.length > 0).
Fixed validation message for Pattern validators.
Updated all of the old org.apache.tapestry.valid client-side validation logic to use dojo.event.browser.stopEvent() to prevent
submission of form when a field is found to be in error.
Fixed tapestry.form.invalidField() so that field focus isn't requested until ~after~ the alert has been displayed.
Changed implementation of tapestry.form compatibility package to actually implement logic + give deprecation warnings when
anyone uses the old Tapestry.on<even> functions.

author: mturyn
msg: Missing Xap.require(<a constructor>) statements provided---we've been getting by so far because we've loaded enough things at start-up to not need these, but that could easily change (e.g., on modularisation), and omitting require()s obscure the dependencies.

author: jmarino
msg: add more javadoc and cosmetic changes
